I realize that this question realy belongs in an Eclipse newsgroup - but
I've not received any response so far so I thought I would try here as well.
BTW I know that JUnit 4.0 makes this entire problem go away - but it will be
a few months before we can switch over.

Eclipse 3.1 provides us with the facility to run all the unit tests in a
plug-in without test suites. This is a wonderful feature given how hard it
is to maintain test suites. However I'm struggling to find documentation
that explains how to run these same tests from ant. So I have two questions

1)       How do I run plain JUnit tests (without test suites) from Ant?

2)       How do I run "JUnit plug-in tests" (without test suites) from Ant?

Confused and feeling under documented
Mark in Ottawa
